document_data.name: Phelaniityr
document_data.mainbody: The '''Phelaniityrs''' were a noble [[sun elf]] family of the city of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/Legacy of the Green Regent/What is the Green Regent}}{{Cite web/Legacy of the Green Regent/A Fellowship Rises}} They were the only sun elf noble family.
document_data.Notable Members:
* [[Halitan Phelaniityr]], patriarch ''circa'' [[1372 DR]]
* [[Aduniron Phelaniityr]], nephew to Halitan
* [[Aliril Phelaniityr]], daughter to Halitan
* [[Schirlyndra Phelaniityr]], daughter to Halitan
